data.sortDetail: Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission UPPSC has issued an advertisement for the recruitment of Civil Judge PCS J Exam 2022-2023. All the candidates who are interested in this UP Civil Judge PCS J Recruitment of UPPSC and fulfill the eligibility can apply online from 10 December 2022 to 06 January 2023. Read the notification for UPPSC Latest Recruitment Qualification, Age Limit, Selection Procedure, Pay Scale, Syllabus and other information.

data.sortDetail: Airports Authority of India (AAI), a Government of India Public Sector Enterprise, constituted by an Act of Parliament, is entrusted with the responsibility of creating, upgrading, maintaining and managing civil aviation infrastructure both on earth and into the air space in the country. AAI has been conferred upon with the Mini Ratna Category - I Status. Airports Authority of India invites applications from eligible candidates to apply ON-LINE.

data.title: UPPSC Medical Officer Grade II Allopathy Post Recruitment Online Form 2022
data.sortDetail: Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission UPPSC has issued an advertisement for the recruitment of Gynecologist, Anesthetics Pediatrician, Radiologist, Pathologist, General Surgeon, General Physician, Ophthalmologist, Orthopedics, ENT Specialist, Dermatologist, Psychiatrist, Microbiologist, Forensic Specialist, Public Health Specialist. Under UP Medical and Health Department. All the candidates who are interested in this Doctor Allopathy Post Direct Recruitment of UPPSC and fulfill the eligibility can apply online from 05 December 2022 to 02 January 2023. Read the notification for UPPSC Latest Recruitment Qualification, Age Limit, Selection Procedure, Pay Scale, Syllabus and other information.
